title: Toward a Unified Theory of Sparse Dimensionality Reduction in Euclidean Space.
abstract: Let Φ∈R m x n  be a sparse Johnson-Lindenstrauss transform [52] with column sparsity s. For a subset T of the unit sphere and e∈(0,1/2), we study settings for m,s to ensure E Φ  sup x∈ T  |Φ x| 2  2  - 1|
